ygData.subject: Re: starting a SK
ygData.msgSnippet: It is Intelligence for Mana but don t put any in there. You will primarily be a tank so concentrate on those stats. Your base Int should be fine. If you want
ygData.messageBody:
It is Intelligence for Mana but don't put any in there. You will primarily
be a tank so concentrate on those stats. Your base Int should be fine. If
you want to do more casting be a Necro.

Human's are best for faction as well as balancing the Leveling a bit.
Dark elves are good for casting as well as for roleplaying.

Troll and ogres are good for full tanking. Take your pick which you prefer.
I would say Troll since they heal up faster.

Inos
Veeshan
